main event: A series of UFO sightings were reported in October 1956 in Cincinnati, Ohio, with multiple witnesses observing unusual lights in the sky.
interesting points: The primary sighting involved a disc-shaped object maneuvering silently in the sky, observed by witnesses for approximately 15 minutes., Witnesses described the object as approximately 50-60 feet in diameter and capable of speeds up to 2,000 mph., One witness reported being awakened by a brilliant light from the object hovering outside his window., Analysis suggested the object might not be of earthly origin based on its erratic motion and lack of noise., Photographs and additional reports related to these sightings were submitted to Project Blue Book for further investigation.
witness description: Three individuals, Mr. John Doe, Mrs. Jane Doe, and Mr. Richard Roe, described the objects as circular or elliptical in shape, approximately 50 feet in diameter, and moving at high speeds.
